mapper.select: SELECT gymno, purchasedate, SUM(purchaseprice) AS total FROM purchase GROUP BY gymno, purchasedate ORDER BY 1
SELECT gymno, TO_CHAR(purchasedate, 'MM') As month, SUM(purchaseprice) AS total FROM purchase GROUP BY gymno, TO_CHAR(purchasedate, 'MM') ORDER BY 1
SELECT COUNT(m.custNo) AS count FROM myschedule m LEFT JOIN class c ON m.classNo = c.classNo WHERE c.gymNo = #{gymNo} AND TO_CHAR(c.classDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(m.custNo) AS count FROM myschedule m LEFT JOIN class c ON m.classNo = c.classNo WHERE c.gymNo = #{gymNo} AND TO_CHAR(c.classDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(c.trainerNo) DESC) AS rank, c.trainerNo, c.gymNo, t.trainerName, t.trainerImgname, COUNT(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(c.classDate, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 0), 'YYYY-MM') THEN c.trainerNo END) AS count_this_month, ( SELECT COUNT(c2.trainerNo) FROM class c2 WHERE c2.trainerNo = c.trainerNo AND TO_CHAR(c2.classDate, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') ) AS count_last_month FROM class c LEFT JOIN trainer t ON c.trainerNo = t.trainerNo WHERE c.trainerNo = c.trainerNo AND c.gymNo = #{gymNo} AND (TO_CHAR(c.classDate, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 0), 'YYYY-MM') OR TO_CHAR(c.classDate, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM')) GROUP BY c.trainerNo, c.gymNo, t.trainerName, t.trainerImgname ORDER BY rank

SELECT NVL(SUM(purchase.purchaseprice) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT purchase.gymNo), 0) / 10000, 0) AS total FROM (SELECT TO_DATE('2022-10', 'YYYY-MM') + (LEVEL - 1) AS month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE('2022-10', 'YYYY-MM') + (LEVEL - 1) <= TO_DATE('2023-06', 'YYYY-MM')) months LEFT JOIN purchase ON TO_CHAR(purchase.purchaseDate, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(months.month, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY REPLACE(TO_CHAR(months.month, 'YYYY-MM'), '-', '') ORDER BY REPLACE(TO_CHAR(months.month, 'YYYY-MM'), '-', '')

SELECT NVL(SUM(purchase.purchaseprice) / 10000, 0) AS total FROM (SELECT TO_DATE('2022-10', 'YYYY-MM') + (LEVEL - 1) AS month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE('2022-10', 'YYYY-MM') + (LEVEL - 1) <= TO_DATE('2023-06', 'YYYY-MM')) months LEFT JOIN purchase ON TO_CHAR(purchase.purchaseDate, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(months.month, 'YYYY-MM') AND purchase.gymNo = #{gymNo} GROUP BY REPLACE(TO_CHAR(months.month, 'YYYY-MM'), '-', '') ORDER BY REPLACE(TO_CHAR(months.month, 'YYYY-MM'), '-', '')
